tech_news.title: Xbox Game Pass loses another seven games in January 2026 - TrueAchievements
tech_news.description: Another seven games, including Citizen Sleeper 2 and Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders, will leave Xbox Game Pass and PC Game Pass at the end of January.

tech_news.title: Xbox gets over 20 new games next week - TrueAchievements
tech_news.description: Next week, another 23 new Xbox games, including Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade, Pathologic 3, and MIO: Memories in Orbit, launch for Xbox consoles and PC.
